clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of SK-MS10 in Subjects With Acute and Chronic Gastritis

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of SK-MS10 in subjects With acute and chronic gastritis.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement rates of erosive gastritis according to the sydney classification
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the grade of erosive gastritis at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Healing rates of erosive gastritis according to the sydney classification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the grade of gastric erosions at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement rates of erosive gastritis by estimated the number of erosion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the number of gastric erosions at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Healing rates of edema according to the sydney classification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the grade of edema at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement rates of erythema according to the sydney classification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the grade of erythema at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement rates of hemorrhage according to the Scandinavian Journal of Gastroenterology - Supplement
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in the grade of hemorrhage at 2 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement rates of symptoms using Korean NDI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Questionaire at baseline and then week 2

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Have been diagnosed as erosive gastritis by endoscopy within 1 weeks before enrollment.
2. Patients who voluntarily signed written informed consent may participate in the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Pregnant or lactating female.
2. Patients have gastric ulcer, duodenal ulcer and GERD.
3. Use of any proton pump inhibitor, H2-receptor antagonist, muscarine receptor antagonist and gastrin receptor antagonist within 2 weeks before initiating study drug therapy
4. Patients requiring corticosteroid therapy
5. Severe neurological or psychological disease
6. History of allergic reaction to the medications used in this study
7. Use of other investigational drugs within 30 days prior to the study.
8. Patients that investigators consider ineligible for this study
